newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch - Sept 20.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch - Sept 20.

text.p: -- The Justice Department has notified Microsoft Corp that it will seek additional information from the software giant on competitive practices. Microsoft touched a new high of 138-1/4 on Thursday before closing up 1-1/4 to 137-3/4.

-- The Securities and Exchange Commission has told Merrill Lynch & Co it plans to recommend enforcement action against the firm for alleged disclosure violations in Orange County, California, bond offerings, attorneys in the case said.

-- CliniCorp Inc, operating under Chapter 11 bankruptcy, said it agreed to reorganize with Trident Medical Concepts Inc, which will likely become controlling shareholder. CliniCorp shares closed at $0.17.
-- PC Service Source Inc said its third-quarter earnings per share would fall below the second quarter's $0.16. PC Service closed at 7-5/8.
-- Uncle B's Bakery Inc said it will post a loss for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended July 31. Uncle B shares closed at 2-3/4.
